text: Louisa Chafee (born September 24, 1991) is an American competitive sailor. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the mixed Nacra 17. She is the daughter of former Rhode Island governor and senator Lincoln Chafee. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American sailors Category:Olympic sailors of the United States Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – Nacra 17 Category:Chafee family
title: Louisa Chafee
